author: SteveL-MSFT

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@SteveL-MSFT**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution!

It looks like you're a Microsoft contributor (Steve Lee (POWERSHELL)). If you're full-time, we DON'T require a Contribution License Agreement. If you are a vendor, please DO sign the electronic Contribution License Agreement. It will take 2 minutes and there's no faxing! https://cla.microsoft.com.

TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: I see commit from Mike about the .spelling file, but that changes has already been merged in PR #2603. Is that a mistake?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @daxian-dbw travis-ci was failing because of the spelling check, so I rebased on his change to get past that

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: what about the changes in https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/2617/commits/21ed897e461e74c05c81484634cef57ef7c90634? Is that included in this PR on purpose?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @daxian-dbw that one wasn't on purpose, will need you to show me how to remove it

title: removed Handles column from Process formatter
